title: Slightest
content:
This font is a part of a 3 set, Slithest normal, Black and Rounded, i put this in a Palm Os and it works good in my Windows Os too. Please let me know if anyone have ideas.   
   
 ![slightest.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141955im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/716.gif)
author: Miguel Hernandez

comments.content:
Thank you!   
   
That is my new money signs, and you are right, the new lowercase Euro works well!, please let me know your opinion.   
   
Miguel   
   
   
 ![neweuro.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141955im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/717.gif)

Here`s the rounded version, any comments?   
   
 ![slightestrounded.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414141955im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/756.gif)
The box version is sharper than the rounded one. Your fonts are always unique.

Very nice!   
   
The only criticism I can see on first glance is that the Euro sign looks too wide in comparison with the rest of the face. Can it be narrowed by a pixel or two?   
   
David
